title: #50 - That Episode with the Fake Irish Accent with Erica Spera and Molly DeMellier
description:
This week on the podcast, Maria talks to the co-hosts of the Shooters Gotta Shoot podcast, Erica Spera and Molly DeMellier.

NCAA athletes Erica Spera and Molly DeMellier have always taken shots on and off the court. They know how to get what they want, except when it comes to men. Recently, dating has become harder to navigate with Erica getting diagnosed with herpes and Molly’s sister/best friend excommunicating herself from the family. But instead of giving up on love, they've made a pact to challenge each other to test modern and old school dating methods. They'll stay in the game and laugh at the rejections they take along the way.

Erica Spera is a New York City comedian originally from Binghamton, NY. Spera was named one of Conan's 2017 TBS Comics to Watch and since then has opened for Patton Oswalt, Bert Kreischer, Judah Friedlander, and more! 

Molly DeMellier is a New York City podcaster, writer and communications expert with experience spanning a variety of industries including entertainment, comedy, travel, sports, tech, and enterprise software. 

Follow Molly on Instagram at http://instagram.com/theguaca_molly

Follow Molly on Twitter at http://twitter.com/theguaca_molly    

Follow Erica on Instagram at http://instagram.com/spericaa

Follow Erica on Twitter at http://twitter.com/spericaa 

Learn more about the Shooters Gotta Shoot podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/shootersgottashootpod 

Enroll in the next Agape Intensive: https://agapematch.com/agape-group-coaching-intensive/ 

Follow Maria on Instagram Follow Maria on TikTok Have a question for Maria? Visit http://askamatchmaker.com To learn more about how Maria and how her team can help you find love, visit agapematch.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
